Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.persistence

Class NodeSettingsPersistorFactory

java.lang.Object
org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.persistence.NodeSettingsPersistorFactory
public final class NodeSettingsPersistorFactory extends Object
Creates and caches NodeSettingsPersistors for DefaultNodeSettings.
Author:
Adrian Nembach, KNIME GmbH, Konstanz, Germany

  • Method Details

    • getPersistor

      public static <S extends DefaultNodeSettings> NodeSettingsPersistor<S> getPersistor(Class<S> settingsClass)
      Gets the persistor for the provided settingsClass. Persistors are cached i.e. subsequent calls to getPersistor(Class) will return the same persistor instance.
      Type Parameters:
      S - the type of the settings
      Parameters:
      settingsClass - class of the settings
      Returns:
      the persistor for the settings

    • createPersistor

      public static <S extends PersistableSettings> NodeSettingsPersistor<S> createPersistor(Class<S> settingsClass)
      Creates the persistor for a settings class.

      If the settings are annotated with a Persistor, then an instance of the Persistor.value() is created.
      Otherwise the existing reflection based persistence is used for backwards compatibility.
      Type Parameters:
      S - the type of DefaultNodeSettings the persistor is for
      Parameters:
      settingsClass - the class of DefaultNodeSettings to create a persistor for
      Returns:
      the persistor for the provided settingsClass
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the provided class references an unsupported persistor (e.g. a custom persistor that extends NodeSettingsPersistor directly)
